dmca.title: Re: ACTION REQUIRED: Copyright infringement on your web site
dmca.body:
I recommend that you invest your money in a good
website to market your talent instead of spending it on filing fees and an attorney.  Don't piss off a
bunch of people you don't know who could help you cross promote your talents.

Did you know your email was read by NUVO's editor?  Don't you know who Big Car is?  They are connected with just about everyone in the Arts in Indy and they now know who you are. Do you feel you made a great first impression? This is a small town...especially if you want to do business in it.  It's even smaller if you are in the arts.

Don't let anyone talk you into doing things that will ultimately
hurt your business.  You've got talent and we've got networks
of people to expose your talent to!  Be smart!  Work with winners and not against them!

-Melyssa
